column4: Is anyone running WoW under ubuntu and wine? I'm trying to do some research as far as average fps, and from what I'm seeing, all the tweaks that people are talking about I've done and am still getting pretty crappy fps.
see the wine forums, and the #winehq channel
i belive you want to use the opengl options. and thats about all i  know on the topic
Yeah, I'm using the opengl option and have been browsing the wine forums for a couple hours. I'll check out their channel though.
